data.title: Where to Watch ‘Grey's Anatomy’: All Seasons on Hulu
data.meta_description: Watch all seasons of ‘Grey’s Anatomy’ on Hulu including the newest episodes from Season 20.
data.meta_site_name: What to Stream on Hulu | Guides
data.text:
Dr. Derek Shepherd once said, “It’s a beautiful day to save lives.” We say any day is a beautiful day to stream an episode or two of Grey’s Anatomy.

Wondering where to watch Grey’s Anatomy? The series’ twentieth season premieres on Thursday, March 14 at 9:00 p.m. EST on ABC, and Hulu has what you need to watch new episodes live or on-demand the next day (Fridays) throughout the season.

But that’s not all — there are additional symptoms, we mean seasons, to consider. Stream every episode of Grey’s Anatomy Seasons 1 – 19 now from Hulu’s on-demand library.

Here’s how to get started with Hulu, so you can begin streaming and STAT!

Watch: Grey’s Anatomy

Where to Watch Grey’s Anatomy

Watch every episode of Grey’s Anatomy on-demand now with any Hulu subscription. That’s right — all 19 seasons are ready for you to watch now from start to finish, including weekly new episodes from Season 20.

Sign Up for Hulu

Grey’s Anatomy Season 20

Season 20 of Grey’s Anatomy premieres Thursday, March 14 at 9:00 p.m. EST on ABC. Watch new episodes live with a Hulu + Live TV* subscription or stream new episodes on-demand the next day (Fridays) from Hulu’s streaming library.

Get Hulu + Live TV

*Live TV plan required to watch live content on Hulu. Regional restrictions, blackouts, and additional terms apply.

Grey’s Anatomy Cast

Meet the cast of creator Shonda Rhimes’ hit series, Grey’s Anatomy, and discover more Shonda Rhimes movies and TV shows streaming now on Hulu.

Ellen Pompeo as Dr. Meredith Grey

Resilient yet compassionate, Dr. Meredith Grey is an incredible surgical doctor who has a profound knack for taking the pain and loss she experiences daily and turning those emotions into tenacity.

Chandra Wilson as Dr. Miranda Bailey

Leadership, authenticity, and humor make Dr. Miranda Bailey a beloved and long-running character on Grey’s Anatomy.

Patrick Dempsey as Dr. Derek Shepherd

Dr. Derek Shepherd (aka McDreamy) is a highly skilled and undeniably charming neurosurgeon whose medical intellect can’t seem to save him from turbulent personal relationships — including the romantic relationship that buds between him and Meredith.

Kevin McKidd as Dr. Owen Hunt

Haunted by his military past, Dr. Hunt is a complex character who’s dedicated to his work in trauma care. In his personal life, he’s known for his rather unsteady romantic relationships.

James Pickens Jr. as Dr. Richard Webber

A distinguished and experienced surgeon, Dr. Webber is a dynamic character who struggles with keeping his tumultuous personal life from intertwining with his already stressful career.

Justin Chambers as Dr. Alex Karev

Dr. Alex Karev hasn’t always been the cooperative and amiable colleague he is today. Throughout the show’s 19 seasons, Dr. Karev undergoes significant character development to become a more compassionate and skilled doctor who finds fulfillment in his career.

Jesse Williams as Dr. Jackson Avery

Dr. Jackson Avery is a charismatic and compassionate plastic surgeon. But like most of the hospital staff, Dr. Avery struggles with loss, grief, legacy, and romance.

Camilla Luddington as Dr. Jo Wilson

Dr. Jo Wilson is as inspiring as it gets. Her resilience and determination alone carried her from homelessness and abuse to finding her calling as an OB/GYN.

Shows Like Grey’s Anatomy

Can’t get enough of Grey’s Anatomy? Check out these similar shows streaming now on Hulu.

The Good Doctor

As if being a surgical doctor isn’t challenging enough, Dr. Shaun Murphy (Freddie Highmore) must navigate complex medical cases, emotional patients, and the skepticism of his peers — which is exceptionally difficult for someone with autism and savant syndrome, like Dr. Murphy.

Check out our guide to The Good Doctor for everything you need to know about watching the seventh and final season airing now.

Watch: The Good Doctor

ER

ER is a pioneer in the world of medical television dramas. Known for its fast-paced and realistic portrayal of a hospital emergency room, ER has remained one of the most popular and successful TV shows of all time. (Not to mention — the show played a major role in launching young George Clooney’s career).

Watch: ER

House, M.D.

Dr. Gregory House (Hugh Laurie) is an unusual and complex character. Despite being incredibly brilliant, House is cynical, sarcastic, and addicted to pain meds — which leads to uniquely unconventional methods of medical diagnosis and a questionable bedside manner.

Watch: House
